short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Piazza/ED Automated Related Question Recommender. PARQR recommends similar posts on ED to save you time!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PARQR is a tool designed for improving the student experience on ED/Piazza and saving time for instructors when managing large online courses. It does this by providing recommendations to similar posts to users when they are asking a question in real time. Also, PARQR contains an instructor dashboard which allows TA's to collaborate and track unanswered posts for large online courses in Piazza.

Please contact parqr.dev.team@gmail.com to have PARQR installed in your course!
